name: bajson
description: huge data friendly & fast json stringifier

scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test && rm -rf /tmp/bajson_build && mkdir -p /tmp/bajson_build && npm pack --pack-destination /tmp/bajson_build && cd /tmp/bajson_build && tar -zxvf bajson* && node -e 'import(`./package/index.js`)' && node -e 'import(`./package/index.cjs`);'
